insert into planocycle.work_priority_order_mst(priority_order_cd,company_cd,author_cd,product_power_cd,shelf_pattern_cd,attribute1 ,attribute2,partition_flag,partition_val,area_name_cd) select priority_order_cd,company_cd,#{authorCd},product_power_cd,shelf_pattern_cd,attribute1 ,attribute2,partition_flag,partition_val,area_name_cd from planocycle.priority_order_mst where company_cd = #{companyCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and priority_order_cd = #{priorityOrderCd,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select product_power_cd as productPowerCd,shelf_pattern_cd as shelfPatternCd,attribute1 as attrA,attribute2 as attrB,area_name_cd as areaNameCd ,partition_flag as partitionFlag,partition_val as partitionVal from planocycle.work_priority_order_mst where priority_order_cd = #{priorityOrderCd} and company_cd = #{companyCd} and author_cd = #{authorCd}
select product_power_cd from planocycle.work_priority_order_mst where company_cd =#{companyCd} and priority_order_cd = #{priorityOrderCd}
